description: George is taking on the mammoth challenge to raise money for a school trip.
title: Alderney teen running 24 miles in 24 hours for fundraiser
title_page: Alderney teen running 24 miles in 24 hours for fundraiser - BBC News
maintext:
A teenager is running a mile every hour for a whole day as part of a fundraising challenge in Alderney.
George is heading out on Saturday and Sunday with the aim of raising Â£1,000 to help pay for his class to go on a school trip to Calshot Activity Centre in Hampshire later this year.
The 14-year-old, who attends St Anne's School, was set to begin his running challenge at 12:00 GMT on Saturday and was due to run a mile (1.6km) each hour over the course of the next 24.
He said it would be an "extremely difficult mental and physical challenge" but he could not wait to get going.
